title: Rocket Pool Adapter
description: Chainlink external adapter for rETH-related feeds.

ETHEREUM_RPC_URL.description: RPC URL to Ethereum mainnet. Used for rETH staking contract.

PRICE_RPC_URL.description: RPC URL for EVM-compatible network. Used for Chainlink price feed source. Defaults to `ETHEREUM_RPC_URL` value.

PRICE_CHAIN_ID.description: Chain ID for EVM-compatible network from PRICE_RPC_URL. Defaults to `1` for Ethereum mainnet.

ETH_USD_PROXY_ADDRESS.description: Proxy address for ETH/USD Chainlink price feed on PRICE_RPC_URL network.
